com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles

Class ArcEdgeStyleRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles.PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles.ArcEdgeStyleRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILookup, IEdgeStyleRenderer, IPathGeometry, IBoundsProvider, IHitTestable, IMarqueeTestable, IObstacleProvider, IVisibilityTestable, IVisualCreator

    public class ArcEdgeStyleRenderer
extends PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
    Default renderer implementation for ArcEdgeStyle.

        public ArcEdgeStyleRenderer()

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        protected void configure()
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        Prepares this instance for subsequent calls after the style and edge have been initialized.

        Upon invocation the Style and Edge properties have been populated by the PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getVisualCreator(IEdge, IEdgeStyle), PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getBoundsProvider(IEdge, IEdgeStyle), PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getHitTestable(IEdge, IEdgeStyle), or PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getMarqueeTestable(IEdge, IEdgeStyle) methods.

        Subclasses which override this method have to call the base implementation, first.

        Overrides:
        configure in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>

      • createPath

        protected GeneralPath createPath()
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        This method should create the basic uncropped path given the control points.
        Specified by:
        createPath in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Returns:
        A path that has to be cropped, yet.

      • cropPath

        protected GeneralPath cropPath(GeneralPath path)
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        Crops the edge's path at the nodes.

        This implementation uses the IEdgePathCropper instances found in the ILookup.lookup(Class) of the source and target port of the edge to perform the actual cropping.

        Overrides:
        cropPath in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Parameters:
        path - The path that should be cropped.
        Returns:
        The cropped path. This is can be either the same instance of the given path or a newly created instance.

      • getSegmentCount

        public int getSegmentCount()
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        Returns the number of "segments" this edge's path consists of.

        This method is part of the IPathGeometry interface, that is implemented by this class. This interface will be returned by PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle).

        Specified by:
        getSegmentCount in interface IPathGeometry
        Specified by:
        getSegmentCount in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Returns:
        the number of segments or -1 if there is no such thing as a segment for this edge.
        See Also:
        PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle)

      • getTangent

        public Tangent getTangent(double ratio)
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        Calculates the tangent on the edge's path at the given ratio point.

        This method is part of the IPathGeometry interface, that is implemented by this class. This interface will be returned by PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle).

        Specified by:
        getTangent in interface IPathGeometry
        Specified by:
        getTangent in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Parameters:
        ratio - a value in [0,1] where 0 is the source's end and 1 is at the target's end of the visible edge path
        Returns:
        The tangential line, if any exists.
        See Also:
        PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle)

      • getTangent

        public Tangent getTangent(int segmentIndex,
                          double ratio)
        Description copied from class: PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer
        Calculates the tangent on the edge's path at the given ratio point for the given segment.

        This method is part of the IPathGeometry interface, that is implemented by this class. This interface will be returned by PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle).

        Specified by:
        getTangent in interface IPathGeometry
        Specified by:
        getTangent in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Parameters:
        segmentIndex - the segment to use for the calculation
        ratio - a value in [0,1] where 0 is the source's end and 1 is at the target's end of the segment
        Returns:
        The tangential line, if any exists.
        See Also:
        PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getTangent(double), PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getSegmentCount(), PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer.getPathGeometry(IEdge, IEdgeStyle)

      • lookup

        public <TLookup> TLookup lookup(Class<TLookup> type)
        Description copied from interface: ILookup
        Returns an instance that implements the given type or null. Typically, this method will be called in order to obtain a different view or aspect of the current instance. This is quite similar to casting or using a super type or interface of this instance, but is not limited to inheritance or compile time constraints. An instance implementing this method is not required to return non-null implementations for the types, nor does it have to return the same instance any time. Also it depends on the type and context whether the instance returned stays up to date or needs to be reobtained for subsequent use.
        Specified by:
        lookup in interface ILookup
        Overrides:
        lookup in class PathBasedEdgeStyleRenderer<ArcEdgeStyle>
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which an instance shall be returned
        Returns:
        an instance that is assignable to type or null
